field.label: DNS Provider
field.help: Select the DNS provider for the DNS-01 Challenge and Dynamic DNS. This is optional, since certificates will be requested from Let's Encrypt via HTTP Challenge when this option is unset. You mostly need this for Wildcard Certificates, and for Dynamic DNS. To use the DNS-01 Challenge and Dynamic DNS, enable the checkbox in a Reverse Proxy Domain or Subdomain. For more information: https://github.com/caddy-dns

field.label: DNS API Standard Field
field.help: This is the standard field for the API Key. There are more fields in "Advanced Mode". If your DNS Provider has only 1 API Key, enter it here and leave all other fields empty. Some DNS Providers need special configuration here: Duckdns "api_token", Route53 "access_key_id", Porkbun "api_key", ACME-DNS "username", Google Cloud DNS "gcp_project", Alidns "access_key_id", Azure "tenant_id", OpenStack Designate "region_name", OVH "endpoint", Namecheap "api_key", PowerDNS "server_url", DDNSS "api_token", Metaname "api_key", Linode "api_token", Tencent Cloud "secret_id", Dinahosting "username", Hexonet "username", Mail-in-a-Box "api_url".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 1
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: Duckdns "override_domain", Route53 "secret_access_key", Porkbun "api_secret_key", ACME-DNS "password", Alidns "access_key_secret", Azure "client_id", OpenStack Designate "tenant_id", OVH "application_key", Namecheap "user", PowerDNS "api_token", DDNSS "username", Metaname "account_reference", Linode "api_url", Tencent Cloud "secret_key", Dinahosting "password", Hexonet "password", Mail-in-a-Box "email_address".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 2
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: Route53 "max_retries", ACME-DNS "subdomain", Azure "client_secret", OpenStack Designate "identity_api_version", OVH "application_secret", Namecheap "api_endpoint", DDNSS "password", Linode "api_version", Mail-in-a-Box "password".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 3
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: Route53 "aws_profile", ACME-DNS "server_url", Azure "subscription_id", OpenStack Designate "password", OVH "consumer_key", Namecheap "client_ip", DDNS "password".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 4
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: Route53 "region", Azure "resource_group_name", OpenStack Designate "username".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 5
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: Route53 "token", OpenStack Designate "tenant_name".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 6
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: OpenStack Designate "auth_url".

field.label: DNS API Additional Field 7
field.help: Leave empty if your DNS Provider isn't specified here: OpenStack Designate "endpoint_type".
